item.description:
Hey Boston PHP Percolates,
Join me Saturday morning at Starbucks from 8am-10am for semi-weekly PHP Percolate Coffee Club. Come talk to me and get advice, help, learning, or chat about anything you want. Bring your laptop, free Wifi, good Coffee.

http://goo.gl/AuSf1

Starbucks Coffee Shop
521 Main Street,
Melrose, MA 02176

See below for more information. RSVP if you plan to come :)

>>>

Hey Boston PHP Percolates,
Some of my favorite things are to teach, mentor, help people, and to drink coffee. I was thinking of a way to bring these hobbies together and came up with a neat idea...

PHP Percolate Coffee Club
Over the summer on weekends, I will be hanging out at my local Starbucks coffee shop in the morning, and I would like to invite any of you to join me for Coffee, Discussion, Advice, and/or PHP mentoring. We can talk about your percolate progress, debug your code, learning new things, and get to know each other more. 

I think this would be a lot of fun, and I am hoping some of you are interested. If you are indeed interested, RSVP.

Regards,

Michael Bourque
Organizer
Boston PHP
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me here: http://goo.gl/AuSf1. I look like this: http://www.meetup.com/bostonphp/members/5046031
item.name: PHP Percolate Coffee Club
